title: Chat restrictions are unfairly stacking..
body:
Look I'm not saying I'm prefect... I main shaco... I have off games... I get told I'm useless... sometimes I am.. and sometimes I go the fuck off on people.

I had a really bad day, both in league and out and said some stuff that probably crossed the line... no death threats, no racial slurs, but I for sure laid into a select few bastards that I should have just muted.

Look I didn't complain  when I got a 20 game chat restriction... I peacefully played out those games...

I didn't complain when at the end of that restriction I instantly got 44 game restriction... I peacefully played out those games... but it sure annoyed me.

But when at the end of that chat restriction... I get hit with another freaking restriction for close to 27 games... when I haven't been talking to my team at all...

This is fucked up... With no time between the bans you can't tell if my attitude has changed in game or not...  this is put a really big halt on what was a last push for master...

Kinda hard since I main jungle and I can't tell my team what I'm trying to do.
